attributes.title: Awful !
attributes.review: The app put viruses in my phone .Every time I open safari now I get a black screen that says trump 2020 .This is ridiculous .I can’t make calls either or text !Trump ,you owe me a new phone !

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to appreciate our amazing president. As soon as I entered my number Donald J Trump himself started sending my aunts uncles nephews neighbors cousins moms dads dog hate mail and death threats!! I did NOT know our president was a terrible dog hating man. Ps trump if you see this my dog DOES NOT look like at oversized rat 😡😡😡

attributes.title: My eyes fell out
attributes.review: Once i opened this app my eyes felt very weird. I continued on this app and my eyes eventually exploded and popped out. I definitely do not recommend this app, if you get it beware of your eyes popping out or even worse dying.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE  DO NOT DONALD
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible! Words cannot even describe how bad my experience was with this app. All i wanted was to keep track of what’s going with president cheeto! But noooooooo all the app was good for was spreading FAKE NEWS and messing with my good vibes. If I could i’d leave no stars.

attributes.title: I absolutely HATE it
attributes.review: It honestly doesn’t work great.. the buttons on the settings don’t work and there is way  too much ads.. I’m disappointed in this app. I get ZERO notifications. Smh. Btw hey my fellow Gen. don’t get the app it’s terrible.

attributes.title: Cheeto puff
attributes.review:
Trump is orange✨🤩🧚‍♀️ i put a picture of him next to a Cheeto and couldnt tell the difference 🧚‍♀️✨❤️ 

 This president yall trumpies want lemme explain something.. trump is racist,homophobic,xenophobic, most likely a rapist and many more things! Y’all are standing up for him but are BLINDSIDED by the things he has done.

attributes.title: A proud GEN-Z
attributes.review: I got in this app thinking it was going to provide me with reliable information but turns out it’s all lies this app is a joke just like the president the audacity of making a useless app this is disrespectful in so many ways

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review:
This app is the single worst thing that has ever happened to me. I first downloaded it because it is my duty as a devout Christian and American citizen 🇺🇸, but as soon as I opened it for the first time my dog caught on fire and my family died😭. 

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and they tracked my location. I was chilling in my Trump merch watching Trump edits when Trump himself came to my house. I immediately offered him food when he body slammed me and caught me on fire 😿 I have lost all respect for that Cheeto 😾

attributes.title: Terrible...
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible! There are so many glitches it’s ridiculous! Plus it constantly shows me fake news! Extremely disappointing!!
